queries.query: select sf.synch_folder_id, sf.[title], sf.[code], sf.[des], sf.synch_path, sf.client_path, sf.[user], sf.[password] from synch_folders sf order by sf.[title]
select s.[name], s.[des], s.[value] from synch_settings s order by s.[name]
update fs_folders set readed = null; update fs_files set readed = null;
delete from fs_folders where readed is null; delete from fs_files where readed is null;
